data.text:
@HeatherMoAndCo Auditor General Releases Damning Report Detailing How Doug Ford’s Government Mismanaged COVID-19 Response. AG notes that the province’s “Health Command Table,” which advised Ford on the pandemic, was not led by public health experts
https://t.co/00SHiaJv2q
@HeatherMoAndCo Every other province is doing it, why shouldn't we?
@pigeonpat1 @HeatherMoAndCo Sadly I think you are right!

@Kahlan791 @HeatherMoAndCo Probably by design. Then Ford can point to that as justification for increasing privatization of our health care.

Ford gets the freedumb vote, conservatives get their private health care. A few people win and the rest of us are out to lunch.
@HeatherMoAndCo HCW's have put up with 2 years of abuse already from anti vaxxers, how many more will quit/retire after Ford fails to keep healthcare facilities & the people inside them safe!

@BregmanPs It’s enraging. This is putting children & people with compromised health, at risk. There is no reason to lift mask mandates in closed spaces. Especially places like grocery stores & big box stores.

We don’t know long term implications for even “mild” infections of #SARSCoV2 #Omicron #Delta & other variants. Is there an increased risk in dementia later in life? Mental health disorders increase. As do strokes. How will this impact kids? #onpoli #onted https://t.co/ceZLykgC7V https://t.co/6cmVgLW0pi
@HeatherMoAndCo Ford thinks division will give him a 2nd term.  It's up to us to make sure he doesn't succeed.
